product_description: Thick braids of straw channel the warm tropics on this slingback sandal with a high wedge heel and platform.
product_details_and_care:
Thick braids of straw channel the warm tropics on this slingback sandal with a high wedge heel and platform.

Adjustable slingback strap with buckle closure
